component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command. Commands that include a name or password are case-sensitive.***
component.existingcommands: Enter the command to verify the interface configuration on S1.

command.deviceresponse:

FastEthernet0/1 unassigned YES manual up up
FastEthernet0/2 unassigned YES manual up up

Vlan1 192.168.10.2 YES manual up up
command.instruction: You are now on S2. Enter the command to verify the interface configuration on S2.

command.deviceresponse:
Interface IP-Address OK? Method Status Protocol
FastEthernet0/1 unassigned YES manual up up
FastEthernet0/2 unassigned YES manual up up

Vlan1 192.168.10.3 YES manual up up
command.instruction: You successfully verified the interface assignment on S1 and S2.
